channel.title: Eclipse problem , client wont update
channel.description: If i start the Eclipse ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,519943.0.html ) client , he wont update and it is hanging at 1%. In the source i saw some MySQL files, do i need to connect the server to an MySQL server? If yes, where can i change the hostname etc...? Thanks in advance.

Wich server do you suggest?

item.title: Eclipse problem , client wont update
item.dc:creator: @Liam_Baby Liam Baby
item.description:
@Liam_Baby wrote:

Never worked for me either, I would suggest using a 317/525 pi based server, and coding 600+ above is too difficult unless you’ve had lots of experience with coding.
